projects.name: Meet & Feat
projects.details: Developed user and authentication service for Meet & Feat, a platform for discovering and joining events and clubs in Chula. Made with NestJS, Drizzle, and Google OAuth.

projects.name: Warehouse of Heart
projects.details: Developed an interactive website contributed to Coach by ChAMP exhibition that lets users remind themselves of their goals and memories in the past to create self-reflection and discover their beings with 11,000+ visitors and 3,000 feedbacks. Made with Next.js, Framer Motion, and Tailwind.

projects.name: Action Plan Announcer LINE Chatbot
projects.details: Chatbot for announcing action plan (scheduled tasks) during a long large-scale event. Used by 120+ staff during an actual event, resulting in an increased accuracy of executing tasks on time. Made with Typescript, Node, Express, Next.js, Tailwind, Mongo Atlas, GCP, LINE LIFF, and LINE Messaging API.

projects.name: Byenior
projects.details: Website for sending and receiving customizable letters between Intania 104 students. Made with Typescript, Bun, Next.js, Tailwind, Supabase, Prisma, and Vercel.

projects.name: Magic Within
projects.details: Led a team of developers to develop an interactive website with minigames for users to overcome self-doubt. Made with Typescript, Bun, Next.js, Tailwind, and Framer Motion.

projects.name: Skillbridge
projects.details: Website for finding part-time jobs for students with a complete user flow starting from applying to receive wages. Made with Typescript, Node, Next.js, Tailwind, NextAuth, PostgreSQL, and AWS S3

projects.name: QAIR
projects.details: A NodeMCU project that collects CO2, CO, and PM2.5 sensor data and then displays on a website as a dashboard. Demoed and presented to instructors as a final term project, resulting in an A grade. Made with C, Firebase, and Next.js

projects.name: RPG Chess
projects.details: A 2D desktop game where chess pieces have HP and various attacks and abilities implemented using OOP. Demoed and presented to instructors as a final term project, resulting in an A grade. Made with Java and JavaFX.

awards.name: 1st Place Winner of Student Track in LINE Hackathon
awards.details: - Developed Shon-ma!, a dating app that allows users to match with others in the same bar using LINE Beacon for location detection. Made with Typescript, Node, Express, Next.js, MUI, Firebase, LINE LIFF, and LINE API.

awards.name: Top 32 in Thailand Online Competitive Programming Contest
1st & 2nd International Olympiad in Informatics Camp Participant
Silver medal in the 16th Thailand Olympiad in Informatics (TOI16)

technologies.details: C/C++, Python, Java, JavaScript, TypeScript, Node.js, SQL
React, Next.js, NextAuth, Tailwind, MaterialUI, Shadcn, Express.js, NestJS, MongoDB, Postgres, Prisma, TypeORM, tRPC, GraphQL, LINE API
AWS, GCP, Firebase, Vercel, Git, GitHub, Docker, Kubernetes, RabbitMQ, Appsmith, Figma, Canva, Jira
OOP, Data Structures & Algorithms, REST API

details: Developed additional feature in TCASter mobile app using Next.js, NestJS, and GraphQL

workExperiences.company: Japan Advanced Institute of Science and Technology
details: Researched Secure Software Development Surveying at Ishikawa, Japan, with financial support from the institute
Categorized coding practices, OWASP, and CWE guidelines based on implementation steps
Worked with the team of developers, QA engineers, and product owners based on Scrum process
Developed new pages for the corporate web with dynamic content and responsive using React and MUI and tested using Cypress.
Contributed to developing and testing Thai Stock Order and Thai Stock Account services using Go and MySQL
Prepared and converted raw data to CSV for an orientation website with 40,000+ visitors using Python.

Developed and designed SQL database, admin tool, and backend server with CRUD, input validation, and file uploading for Intania Run website with 4,200+ registrants using Express, NeonDB, Prisma, and Appsmith.
Led a team of developers to develop a project tracker website to facilitate the internal document process in the organization using Next.js, Tailwind, NestJS, and PostgreSQL.
Maintained and developed new features in the registration website using PostgreSQL, Spring, and React.
Planned and supervised the registration process from 1,335 applicants via the website to 300 final participants.
Developed an internal tool for the document verification process using Appsmith.
Recruited and led a team of 20, organized and distributed tasks among the team, created a collaborative environment, and guided team members during the preparation and execution phases.
Developed a redesigned Reg Chula platform using Next.js and LINE OA for a demo in HackChula 2024.

Developed a website for online voting and showing vote results using React and event management and discovery platform for clubs using React and Firebase with a team of 4-6 people in Thinc. 10 Days Project.
